description:
10/2011 - 1st place in NEW category!
(US/Russia)

We'd like to thank all our viewers for your feedback and support - they are very helpful and important to us.
User count just went over 100K! How awesome is that?  

Rain TV Channel. Watching all your favorite programs and movies in real time on your Apple portable device is now seamless, thanks to Rain TV Channel app. Rain TV Channel is brand new, energetic and interactive TV channel from Russia. Rain consists of honest and live news coverage, experimentation, concerts, independent programming, analytics, discussions, science and culture news, politics, business and documentaries. We talk about everything important to us with everyone who is interesting to us. Aside from keeping you connected to your favorite shows, this app ensures that you can also interact with the hosts via comment section. The Channel schedule that is loaded into this app gives you all the information about current and upcoming shows.

ATTENTION!
Due to various video streaming enhancing procedures, including server side upgrades and maintenance, viewer may experience some issues with the quality of the video, tv guide and commenting features. Thank you for your understanding.
